data.what_is: 90degree Team Task is implemented to provide a comprehensive web based platform to manage different projects, track tasks, users, and offer a collaboration framework for employees.
data.product_description: 90degree Team Task is implemented to provide a comprehensive web based platform to manage different projects, track tasks, users, and offer a collaboration framework for employees.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Get complete CRM & Project Management Solution
Get complete CRM & Project Management with Advanced services
30-day free trial. No credit card required.

initial_reviews.review_title: Its a nice to have not a need to have
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 90degree Team Task?
The UI is easy you use and it has distinctive bars that allows you to easily follow.  The summary sheet is great

What do you dislike about 90degree Team Task?
Sometimes the customization is hard to program / follow and it is not easy to switch over to what I want to display.

What problems is 90degree Team Task solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helps solve tracking and overall communication. I think for SMB it might be too much but for medium size businesses that have offices globally it could be intersting.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 90degree Team Task?
It offers a comprehensive web based platform to manage different projects, track tasks, users, and offer a collaboration framework. Also it can handle different projects and provides cloud based services.

What do you dislike about 90degree Team Task?
No negative comments so far. It is a very promising team management tool.

Recommendations to others considering 90degree Team Task:
I would definitely recommend giving 90degree Team Task a try as it shows very good potential as a Software as a Service (SaaS); especially as a project management tool.

What problems is 90degree Team Task solving and how is that benefiting you?
I mainly use the three main project management features: Discussion Board, Team Task Scheduler, and Document Management  It provides very good team collaboration. Furthermore, is helps organising to do lists and sharing through options such as: tags for searching your files, no file type restrictions, and 24/7/365 accessibility over the cloud.
